itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Platinum Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Platinum.

item.name: Topaz Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Platinum Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Platinum Ore. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Melted Platinum Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Platinum Ore.
